channel.title: 4th and Goal
channel.description: All you need to know this week in the NFL and more. Every week, we get together and talk football. We'll review games, preview key match-ups, and hit our Topic of the Week. Look for our Podcast in the iTunes Music Store, and join the conversation at http://4thandgoalshow.blogspot.com.
channel.itunes:summary: All you need to know this week in the NFL and more. Every week, we get together and talk football. We'll review games, preview key match-ups, and hit our Topic of the Week. Look for our Podcast in the iTunes Music Store, and join the conversation at http://4thandgoalshow.blogspot.com. "Not Your Enemy" by megaphone and "Wired For Loud" by David Henderson are used in accordance with the Creative Commons Attribution License, http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/2.5/
channel.itunes:subtitle: All you need to know this week in the NFL and more.
channel.itunes:author: 4th and Goal
channel.itunes:keywords: NFL, football, sports, talk, comedy, Steelers, Dolphins, Colts, Patriots

item.title: 4th and Goal Episode 23
item.itunes:author: 4th and Goal
item.dc:creator: 4th and Goal
item.description: This week we decided not to talk about the defensive pro bowl, we instead discuss the great monday night game between the pats and the ravens. We also talk about possible coaching changes that could be made in the up coming year. And as always we give out our pics for the up coming week.

item.dc:creator: 4th and Goal
item.description: This week we dicuss the Chris chambers trade to San diego, what if any the Dolphins and Rams can look forward to. We through a little college football into the mix with some BCS Rant, and as always our picks for the up coming week as well as the score board.

item.title: 4th and Goal Episode 16
item.itunes:author: 4th and Goal
item.dc:creator: 4th and Goal
item.description: This week we talk about Trent Green and his status, plus debate if he gave a cheap shot to Travis Johnson. We also debate the worse teams in the NFL and which one will get a win first. Plus, there's What's Your Fantasy? and the Pick 'Em segments you've become addicted to.

item.itunes:author: 4th and Goal
item.dc:creator: 4th and Goal
item.description: This week, we ask if the Saints season is already over with an 0-3 start. We also cover the injury report for Week 4 in the NFL, What's Your Fantasy?, and our Over/Under picks.

item.title: 4th and Goal Episode 14
item.itunes:author: 4th and Goal
item.dc:creator: 4th and Goal
item.description: This week, we made an effort to cut down the length of the show. So what happened? We put together the longest episode to date, clocking in at around two and a half hours! There's just too much stuff in the NFL to talk about. What's going on with McNabb? What 2-0 teams are pretending and which 0-2 team will turn it around this week? We cover all these topics and more this week on 4th and Goal!

item.title: 4th and Goal Episode 13
item.itunes:author: 4th and Goal
item.dc:creator: 4th and Goal
item.description: In this episode, we run through the Week 1 Scoreboard, ask if Vince Young is a goo d quarterback, and Reggie answers our questions in What's Your Fantasy? We also have a healthy dose of news topics to cover, and we pick the winners for Week 2.

item.itunes:author: 4th and Goal
item.dc:creator: 4th and Goal
item.description: The first full week of the 2007 regular season! We go over our picks for the week, as well as our Over/Under for Week 1. Then our Fantasy Guru answers our questions in What's Your Fantasy?

item.title: 4th and Goal Episode 11
item.itunes:author: 4th and Goal
item.dc:creator: 4th and Goal
item.description: The last week before the NFL regular season begins! It's also the first night of college football. So, to celebrate, we begin our NFL Week 1 picks. We also have a special college football themed round table discussion, where the guys try to convince Mike why he should care about college football, and the dreaded playoff debate.

item.title: 4th and Goal Episode 10
item.itunes:author: 4th and Goal
item.dc:creator: 4th and Goal
item.description: The loudest, and probably longest episode of 4th and Goal yet. It's our 10th episode spectacular, but instead of celebrating with cake and congratulating each other, we have to yell and scream about the Michael Vick fiasco. Plus our news and round robin segments that you have come to love.

item.title: 4th and Goal Episode 9
item.itunes:author: 4th and Goal
item.dc:creator: 4th and Goal
item.description: This week, we talk about Vick and his options after his other two defendants both plea guilty. We also talk about Larry Johnson and if he is close to signing with the Chiefs or not. All that, plus a lengthy news segment and another round table discussion. Oh yeah, and another edition of Corrections and Rejections.

item.title: 4th and Goal Episode 7
item.itunes:author: 4th and Goal
item.dc:creator: 4th and Goal
item.description: This week we debut a new segment we like to call "Corrections and Rejections", tackle a long news segment, and get into a heavy round table discussion debating everything from fantasy draft pointers to racism in the NFL. Yeah, you'll have to listen to figure out how we went from one extreme to the other.

item.dc:creator: 4th and Goal
item.description: This week, we let it all out. Michael Vick and his problems leads into a debate about the NBA and their recent cheating scandal...which then leads into yelling. Add to that a long news segment and you've got 4th and Goal, Episode 6.
